definition: Feng Deying (1935-), socialist realist novelist, author of Bitter cauliflower 苦菜花[ku3 cai4 hua1] (1954)
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: Feng Deying was a typical writer in China in the last century.
sentences.chinese: 馮德英是上世紀頗有代表性的一位本土作家。
